Mr.Raju obtained his Masters degree in Computer applications (MCA) from Nagarjuna University in 2003.A 31 year old first generation entrepreneur, Raju studied market requirements in the Internet segment,and particularly in the field of Consumer Internet businesses and mobile messaging. In 2004, after an extensive research, he started Way2Online Interactive India pvt ltd, a highly innovative and emerging player in the enterprise messaging market. During the initial days, Way2Online is engaged in the business of providing enterprise messaging solutions to leading enterprises across the country.
